title: Can you please share your Dev process of the VGU'S and champions wit us?
body:
I saw 2 years ago a small image  about a WIP version of Bard. Bard was Nautilus and was follow by many smaller Nauts, because Bards model was still in work and need something to test Bard's meeps.

Can you share a blog or something like that   about the progess  of these champions?

replies.body:
Hey Lukas, there was an article posted on Nexus last year about champion prototypes. It covers Gnar, Rek'Sai, and Kled.

http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/10/dev-on-champion-prototypes/

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=cORK0xN3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-18T23:43:09.906+0000)
>
> Hey Lukas, there was an article posted on Nexus last year about champion prototypes. It covers Gnar, Rek'Sai, and Kled.
> 
> http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/10/dev-on-champion-prototypes/


Yeah thanks man :D 
I mean this one :D  Can we expect more of them?
I hope we can see more of this stuff in the future.
